name: Calculator
description: - Simple calculator - always ontop widget - support expression + - x  ( )  - support percent operation - Memory buttons - Scientific calculator - Support digit grouping separator(comma, space, Apostrophe) - Support digit grouping method (987,654,321.012 or 9,8765,4321.012 or 98,76,54,321.012) - History list, restore last value  [Percent operation] 100x3%=3 (3% of 100)  [Memory buttons] M+ : memory + result M- : memory - result MR : memory return MC : memory clear MS : memory set  [Clear button] C : clear AC : all clear (clear result and memory)  [Scientific Calculator]
